DOC.brief_summary: TB-403 is a monoclonal antibody directed against Placental Growth Factor (PlGF). The antibody binds to PlGF and inhibits the binding to it's receptor, VEGF-1. By preventing this binding, growth of tumor vessels are inhibited and tumor growth prevented. In this study we are investigating the tolerability and safety of TB-403 in patients with solid tumors who receives multiple intravenous doses of TB-403.
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study on Monoclonal Antibody TB-403 Directed Against PlGF in Patients With Solid Tumours
DOC.criteria: Confirmed malignity Measurable disease Performance status 1 or less (ECOG) Acute illness or infection Concurrent second malignancy
